amendment.description: Amendment requires estuary programs to include in their comprehensive conservation and management plans a coordinated monitoring strategy between federal, state, and local entities.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3, printed in House Report 111-463 to require estuary programs to include in their comprehensive conservation and management plans a coordinated monitoring strategy between federal, state, and local entities.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kagen amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
